p: Hitherto, multiple studies did not find any serious life-threatening adverse effects attributable to PT [ 85, 86, 87, 88]. No safety concerns were observed in the phase I therapy of venous leg ulcers in humans [ 89]. Additionally, in a study where whole viral communities were transferred via FMT between human individuals, none of the transferred viruses were known to infect human cells [ 70]. On the basis of these results, phage usage appears to be safe without any serious side effects.
